DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective : To evaluate efficacy term oocyte retrieval number rLH supplement woman hyporesponse rFSH pituitary downregulation . Secondary objective : To explore efficacy rLH supplement woman hyporesponse rFSH pituitary downregulation To evaluate safety rLH supplementation hyporesponse woman
DOC.brief_title: To Describe Effect rhLH Supplementation Women With Hyporesponse rhFSH After Pituitary Downregulation
DOC.detailed_description: Primary endpoint : Number oocyte retrieve Secondary endpoint : 1 . Oestrodial hCG day ( pg/ml ) 2 . Number embryos 3 . Implantation rate ( % ) 4 . Clinical pregnancy rate ( % ) 5 . Ongoing PR per IVF cycle ( % ) 6 . Abortion rate ( % ) 7 . Ampoules rFSH 8 . FertiQoL score Safety endpoint : adverse event
DOC.criteria: 1 . 2040 year old woman 2 . With menstrual cycle range 2435 day , intraindividual variability±3 day 3 . Basal FSH < 10 IU/L cycle D2D5 4 . 18 < BMI < 30 5 . Presence two ovary 6 . No ovarian stimulation past 3 month 7 . Signed inform consent form . 1 . Polycystic ovarian syndrome 2. rAFS stage ⅢⅣ endometriosis 3 . Chromosomal abnormality , endocrinological and/or autoimmune disorder . 4 . More two previously unsuccessful IVF .
